summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Water Supply System, providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property and property rights in unplatted portions of Sections 15 and 16 of Township 23 North, Range 5 East, W. M., for a pumping plant site; and for pipeline right of way between said pumping plant site and the Mercer Island pipeline right of way as authorized by Condemnation Ordinance No. 84393.
